cause.description:
SAVE, A Friend to Homeless Animals is a 501(c)3 nonprofit shelter and animal welfare organization dedicated to protecting the health and wellbeing of homeless companion animals in the Greater Princeton area. With your help we can minimize the homeless animal population in the Garden State and find cats and dogs forever families
1. Be a friend. Volunteer. Adopt. Donate.
cause.mission: Find forever homes for homeless animals in Ne Jersey.
cause.name: Save: A Friend to Homeless Animals
